p: Liver function tests do not always normalize after successful surgical attenuation of portosystemic shunts (PSS). Currently the gold standard to demonstrate absence of portosystemic shunting is portal scintigraphy. Serum hyaluronic acid concentrations (sHA) in dogs with PSS are increased compared to those in healthy dogs.
